name: High-Waisted Skinny Jeans
desc: Flattering high-waisted skinny jeans that hug your curves. Made from stretchable denim for all-day comfort. Perfect for casual outings or nights out.

name: Classic Straight-Leg Jeans
desc: These timeless straight-leg jeans are a wardrobe staple. Designed for comfort and versatility, they pair well with tees, shirts, and blouses alike.

name: Distressed Boyfriend Jeans
desc: Relaxed fit boyfriend jeans with subtle distressed detailing. Soft, breathable denim offers a laid-back yet stylish look for weekends.

name: Wide-Leg High-Rise Jeans
desc: Modern wide-leg jeans with a flattering high rise. Crafted for comfort and movement. Ideal for pairing with cropped tops or tucked-in shirts.

name: Cropped Flared Denim
desc: Trendy cropped denim with a flared hem. This pair adds a retro charm to your wardrobe and is great for showcasing your favorite footwear.

name: Black Slim-Fit Jeans
desc: A must-have in every closet, these black slim-fit jeans go with everything. Sleek, stretchy, and perfect for work or evenings out.

name: Ripped Denim Mom Jeans
desc: Mom jeans with stylish ripped detailing for a bold yet relaxed vibe. Pair with a tucked tee or casual shirt for that everyday edge.

name: Vintage Wash Bootcut Jeans
desc: Bootcut jeans in a vintage wash, perfect for balancing proportions. Great choice for curvy figures, offering a flattering flare at the hem.
